body:
I have two questions regarding this PR.

Newer versions of SCR now *require* DTCMP as a dependency rather than allowing it as an option.  It would be nice to disable the ``+dtcmp`` variant for those later SCR versions, but I don't see a way to do that.

Is there a way?

I did find this related issue:
https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/9740

Also, I'd like to change a particular directory from ``/tmp`` to ``/dev/shm``.  While this is a better choice on Linux systems, ``/dev/shm`` does not exist on other platforms like macOS.  It'd be nice to use ``/dev/shm`` on Linux but keep ``/tmp`` on other platforms.

Is there a recommended way to set the variant default based on the target platform?

Thanks for any help!
title: scr: require dtcmp, switch from /tmp to /dev/shm
